name: HealthData.gov
description: This site is managed by the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services Office of the Chief Data Officer. The site is dedicated to making data discoverable and making valuable government data available to the public in the hopes of better health outcomes for all. Data is collected and supplied from agencies from the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services as well as state partners, including CMS, CDC, FDA, and AHRQ.
owner_name: U.S. Department of Health and Human Services Office of the Chief Data Officer
